labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: The screen should not become completely, a warning should appear.
data.short_description: [RESUBMITTING] Screen turns black after joining a call via mobile dvice
data.steps_to_repro: - Call someone - Ask them to share their screen or turn on the webcam - Open their screen in full-screen mode - Take your phone - Join the conversation via phone - Look at your PC's screen
